title: React Storefront Kit
description: React Storefront Kit contains a set of Shopify-specific commerce components, hooks, and utilities that help accelerate your development process. This guide provides a complete reference of the components, hooks, and utilities that React Storefront Kit offers, and their relationships to each other.

sectionSubContent.title: Primitive Components
sectionSubContent.sectionContent: React Storefront Kit provides Primitive components are the building blocks for different component types, including products, variants, and cart.

sectionSubContent.title: Hooks
sectionSubContent.sectionContent: React Storefront Kit hooks are functions that allow you to use state and other methods inside React Storefront Kit components.

sectionSubContent.title: Utilities
sectionSubContent.sectionContent: React Storefront Kit utilities are functions that perform different tasks to help you develop quickly.
